data.eml:eml: Ten new species of Amphidraus Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryini) and three new combinations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruiz, Gustavo R. S. (2017): Ten new species of Amphidraus Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryini) and three new combinations. Zootaxa 4312 (3): 401-437, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4312.3.1
